snippet.title: Herodes Trailer ENG
snippet.description:
Herodes is set in a not so distant future, where medicine and technology have evolved together, so C.L.R.T (Cellular Level Reduction Technology) could be created. 
In a amortal world, a new virus comes and threatens mankind as a whole.
The main mission of the game is to free each of the pacient's vital organs of this terrible viral infection and to discover the origin of this virus that is causing all this torment.
